value:
This is a wonderful place. Everywhere
I look, I see order—from the people to
the castle itself.$k$pThat's the soul of this kingdom and its
people. I'm sure of it.

I was captured by the enemy...and
caused everyone a lot of trouble. But
I'm fighting for the Deliverance now.

The way you look after your people...
I'm sure that everyone feels safe
just knowing you're here. Thank you.

Show me the place you consider
the most beautiful. I want to take my
love there.

I was just sharpening my lance.
I must be ready to fight at any time
for the safety of everyone here.

I'm glad you're well. I bring regards
from $Nf.

I do wonder... Who could my rival
be?

I train every day. That is how you
improve—bit by bit.
This...is disappointing. Truly.

I shall give it my all. I can do no
less for you.

I am Mathilda of the Deliverance.
I will prove to you that, in battle, I am
as strong as anyone.

Do you have a moment? I need your
advice. It's about my love's sister. No
matter what I do, it's not enough.$k$pI want to bridge the gap between us.
She is not so different from him...
Attractive, intelligent, and strong.$k$pI'm rambling. What I really want to
ask is this: what can I do?$k$pYou say that if I care this much, she'll
come around eventually? I hope so.
For now, I'll take your word for it.$k$pIt's strange, isn't it? It's so easy to talk
to you, even about such a difficult
subject... I hope we may speak again.
せやあっ
Here I go!
ああああーっ！
Can't be...!
How presumptuous!
My turn!
So long!
I've seen enough.
Not now...
Hm...
All right. What do you want?
This world is quite the diversion.
Should I tell you of my lover? Why not. He's the best man in my world.
If you have a concern, I'll be here for you, day or night.
I wonder if I'll ever get any closer to Clair...
I take up my lance in the service of one man, and one man alone.
I'm proud to fight at your side.
All right.
A task.
I'm off.
